Instance.description: Tuning specific to a an active career gig. These are adhoc career events which gives the sim pay if they complete it.

TunableVariant.name: gig_pay_rabbit_hole
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we will grant this amount of money to sim when they finished the gig in rabbithole. If disabled, we will grant minimum pay defined in gig_pay instead.

Tunable.name: gig_picker_localization_format
Tunable.description: String used to format the description in the gig picker. Currently has tokens for name, payout, gig time, tip title, and tip text. Note: Acting career with audition has its own flow and won't consider this string, it will use GIG_PICKER_LOCALIZATION_FORMAT defined in career.career_tuning instead.
